title: Low Ping but high Lag? Anyone got a fix?
body: Game has been running fine for years but for the last couple of days it's become unplayable. Everything else on my computer seems to be working normally except League. Also ran a repair to no effect. I don't understand, please help.

replies.body: Low ping but high lag can be a good indication of packet loss which can be caused by a network problem reaching the game server.  Running a repair won't necessarily fix this as it repairs game files and not your connection.  Instead, go through each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
